      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h1>Test Race: Questions</h1>

<table><tr><td bgcolor='$!data.voicecolor'><i>Please read these statements about the experiment carefully and select 
the alternatives that describe the race part of the experiment most accurately. If you 
have trouble finding the right answer, DO NOT guess. Instead, clarify with a experiment
administrator what the correct answer should be.
</i></td></tr></table>

<p>Once you have completed these questions, click 'Continue' and the first real race will start.  Good luck!</p>

#if ( !$error.isValid() )
<p><font color='#ff0000;'>There was at least one error.  Please raise your hand and
ask a experiment administrator for help.<font></p>
#end

<p>
The rest of the experiment consists of 
<select name='test_numraces'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='3'>3</option>
<option value='4'>4</option>
<option value='5'>5</option>
<option value='6'>6</option>
<option value='7'>7</option>
</select>
 car races. In each race there will be
<select name='test_numcars'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='3'>3</option>
<option value='4'>4</option>
<option value='5'>5</option>
<option value='6'>6</option>
<option value='7'>7</option>
</select>
 cars competing. 
You will be able to select the 
<select name='test_carcolor'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='1'>colour</option>
<option value='2'>brand</option>
<option value='3'>position</option>
</select>
 of your car and how much to bet and how much to invest into your car 
<select name='test_eachround'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='1'>once before all the races start</option>
<option value='2'>at the beginning of each race</option>
<option value='3'>after each race</option>
</select>
.</p>

<p>
You will be able to bet 
<select name='test_bet'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='1'>any fraction of your earnings </option>
<option value='2'>between a set minimum and 100 % of your earnings</option>
<option value='3'>whatever amount is left of your earnings</option>
</select>
in each race and the rest of your earnings will 
<select name='test_invest'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='1'>be kept for the next round</option>
<option value='2'>be invested into the engine of your car</option>
<option value='3'>be paid out at the end</option>
</select>
.
At the end you will be paid
<select name='test_paymode'>
<option value='0'>-</option>
<option value='1'>the sum of the payouts from ALL the races</option>
<option value='2'>the payout of ONE race you select</option>
<option value='3'>the payout of ONE race selected by a random draw</option>
</select>
.
</p>


<p>
#if ( "$data.newpage" == "true" )
    <mp3 name='testrace_questions' file='oetinvest/media/tr21_questions.mp3' button='Continue'>
#else

    <input type='submit' name='submit' value='Continue'>
#end
<p>

#parse("oetinvest/footer.vm")
